description: This file implements a web-based password change form for an administrative interface, including client-side validation, UI elements, and JavaScript functions to handle form submission and user interactions.

methods.name: getInstanceNum
methods.description: Determines the user instance number based on the logged-in username stored in session variable.

methods.name: cancel_save
methods.description: Redirects the user to 'at_a_glance.php' when cancel is clicked.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends the new password configuration via AJAX to the server and handles the response, notifying the user of success or failure.

methods.name: next_step
methods.description: Validates password change conditions and invokes set_config to process the password change.
